actions.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 229 (Roll no. 592).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 229 (Roll no. 592).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Markey.

description: Amendment sought to allow the Secretary of Interior to promulgate rules under the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act if such rules would reduce the prevalence of pulmonary diseases, lung cancer, cardiovascular disease or reduce the prevalence of birth defects or reproductive problems in pregnant women or children.
purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-680 to allow the Secretary of Interior to promulgate rules under the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act, if such rule would reduce the prevalence of pulmonary diseases, lung cancer, cardiovascular disease or reduce the prevalence of birth defects or reproductive problems in pregnant women or children.
